About Seer:

Seer is built by a dedicated and experienced team who are revolutionising Epilepsy management. We aim to empower patients and caregivers by improving access to services which positively improves patient outcomes. We achieve this by taking diagnostic testing from the hospital environment to the home. 



Vision & Values:

Seer is committed to embracing and always improving our well-established positive culture. We strive to foster an environment that allows and encourages all team members to challenge the status quo. When planning business growth and strategizing around new developments – improving patient outcomes forms the basis of all fundamental business decisions. 

We also believe in, and actively promote a healthy work-life balance. Whilst we are a passionate group who enjoy working hard, and actively encourage our team members to stretch their capabilities - we also recognise that everyone has their own life to lead outside of work. We believe good health and wellbeing is everyone’s right, and that everyone needs space and time for family, friends and your own personal time. Where required our individualised flexible work place practices, allow our team members to tailor a framework that allows our them to operate at their peak potential in and out of the work environment.
